prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small turtle with a shell.
Show me a cute aquatic creature with a friendly demeanor and blue skin.
Imagine a Pokemon that can swim gracefully and has a playful personality.
Design a small, turtle-like Pokemon with a round shell and a joyful expression.
Generate a starter Pokemon that is capable of learning various water-based moves.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in aquatic environments and has a gentle nature.
Give me a visual representation of a Pokemon that is both adorable and strong.
